amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the administrative spending salaries and expense accounts in the bill by 3 percent and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds over numerous accounts including the DEA and the FBI and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 270 (Roll no. 203).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 270 (Roll no. 203).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
